::KitKat::

She heard the voice and smirked.  His vote of confidence was 
overwhelming her. She looks at Megatron. She lens over and whisperes 
to him, "We have to get to Phobia's ship and get away from Rowdy. 
Phobia may be able to help us."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> "You're a bright girl you can figure it out." he was out of ideas 
at 
> the moment on how to deal with the tyrant. The only other option 
was 
> clear to him, he picked up his decimator rifle, rubbing it as if he 
> were oiling an old style rifle. The only other option would be to 
> destroy Megatron and make it look like Kit Kats orders. By Predacon 
> law she would then become leader and he would be out of danger.
>
